sentences.english: Conclusions Epidemic of malaria in Huaiyuan county was severe. Comprehensive measures should be adopted.
sentences.chinese: 結論懷遠縣瘧疾流行較重，應加強綜合干預措施控制。

sentences.english: Huaiyuan dialect is subordinate to Jianghuai mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 安徽懷遠方言屬江淮官話。
